scripts.docker-build: docker build -t gauntface/gf-site:base -f src/infra/docker/base . && docker build -t gauntface/gf-site:development -f src/infra/docker/development .
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-cleanup && npm run docker-build && docker run --name gauntface-local-docker -e BUILDTYPE=development -p 5123:80 -v $(pwd)/build:/gauntface/site -t gauntface/gf-site:development
scripts.docker-cleanup: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-remove
